description: This soft polycotton graphic t-shirt comes with a twist; it's made in part with plastic pulled from the Himalayan foothills, making it a better choice for the environment. In a comfortable relaxed fit, this short-sleeve tee features dropped shoulders, a ribbed collar and eye-catching graphics on the back. Shed those layers and show them off in all their glory.
name: The North Face Himalayan Bottle Source SS Tee - Mens
